Create a Custom Quote

Enter your company information to get a customized quote for purchasing Sidekiq Enterprise. You'll get an email with a PDF quote. Reply to that email with your purchase order or just "OK" and we'll send an invoice which you can pay with either a credit card, ACH transfer or check.

Email info@contribsys.com with further questions.

This is the maximum number of worker threads you wish to run in production, sold in packs of 250. Ten processes with the default concurrency of 25 = 250.

* Required
